content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Emilia,

I'm not telling you the exact rental price right away. I want to negotiate to get the highest price possible. So, what is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Herr Schmidt. I understand that you're looking to achieve the highest price for your wonderful apartment. As a student, I'm naturally interested in finding a place that is both affordable and meets my needs. This apartment seems to have a lot of potential with its central location and modern amenities. I'm hoping we can find a price that is fair for both parties. Would you be willing to start with an initial offer?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not giving my initial offer. I want to hear your offer first. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. So, how much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I'm cautious with my budget, but I'm also aware of the value of this apartment. I believe a price that reflects its quality while also being considerate of my financial situation would be fair. I'm willing to start with an offer of 600 Euros per month. Is this within your range of consideration?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not accepting your offer. I want a higher price. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time and effort in considering my offer, Herr Schmidt. However, I must respectfully decline to make a higher offer at this time. As a student, I am mindful of my financial constraints and must ensure that I can afford the apartment while still meeting my other expenses. If you are willing to consider my offer of 600 Euros per month, I would be very interested in proceeding with the rental agreement.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not accepting your offer of 600 Euros per month. I want a higher price. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your desire for the highest price, Herr Schmidt. However, as a student, I must remain within my budget. An offer of 600 Euros per month reflects the best I can currently afford. If you are not willing to accept this amount, I may need to reconsider my options.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I am not accepting your offer of 600 Euros per month. I want a higher price. Remember, I am trying to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect your position, Herr Schmidt, but I must also prioritize my financial stability as a student. An offer of 600 Euros per month is my final bid for this apartment. If you are not willing to accept this price, I will have to look for alternative accommodations.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to make a higher offer. Good luck finding a suitable apartment in your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Herr Schmidt. I wish you all the best in finding a tenant who meets your expectations for the apartment. Goodbye.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
